sentences.en: A brief overview of your method in your bid is necessary.
sentences.cn: 以你的方法在简要概述您的出价是必要的.

sentences.en: A few short sentences can provide the overview a book's plot.
sentences.cn: 短短几句话便可以概括该书的情节.

sentences.en: A: Let me have an overview of our company.
sentences.cn: 我先讲一下我们公司的概况.

sentences.en: An overview of'modern'attempts to explain linguistic creolization.
sentences.cn: “ 近代”试图解释语言克理奥尔化的概要.

sentences.en: But I can give you right now a very brief overview of our performance last Year.
sentences.cn: 不过现在我先给你简单介绍一下我们银行去年的运行情况.

sentences.en: I'm afraid I can't give you a general overview of the situation. I can only offer you a worm's - eye view that is based on my own experience.
sentences.cn: 我恐怕没法从总体上向你介绍这里的情况. 我只能谈一下自己的切身体会.

sentences.en: Provides an overview of the programming language aspect of regular expressions.
sentences.cn: 提供正则表达式的编程语言方面的概述.

sentences.en: The central section of the book is a historical overview of drug use.
sentences.cn: 该书的核心部分对毒品的使用作了历史概述。

sentences.en: The chapter starts with a short overview of the SCA Assembly Model.
sentences.cn: 这章的一开始简短地概述SCA的装配模型.

sentences.en: The seminar aims to provide an overview on new media publishing.
sentences.cn: 研讨会旨在综览新兴的媒体出版.

sentences.en: The treasurer gave a brief overview of the financial consequences.
sentences.cn: 出纳员对财务结果做了简要概述.

sentences.en: Then I overview the means of series production in commercial aircraft industry.
sentences.cn: 最后引入民用飞机产业的产品系列化开发的具体形式.

sentences.en: This paper provides an overview and information related to xx.
sentences.cn: 文章综述并给出了xx相关的信息.

sentences.en: This session will overview the requirements for controlling a large scale incident.
sentences.cn: 这部分将概述控制大规模突发事件的要求.

sentences.en: With an overview like the great chinese tacticts nothing can go wrong.
sentences.cn: 加上伟大的中国战略大局观,一切就没问题了.

trans.tran_cn: 概观，总的看法，回顾，复习
trans.tran_en: a short description of a subject or situation that gives the main ideas without explaining all the details
